comment.author: 81376848@N00
comment._content: I have to call this a favorite after being so impressed by the 2001 Anzac parade in Brisbane. The variety of uniforms and banners representing so many of her majesty's campaigns in so many parts of the world was fascinating. The following month I took my kids to see the first Memorial Day parade I've ever attended in the US. After being disappointed by a shadow of what must have been great American parades, I was after all relieved that our own display of military pride had degraded so much. Ironic, huh?
